sub_title: Sustainable Innovation | Business Development | MT @ StartLife
summary:
Laura is a results-driven innovation leader who wants to move the needle in transitioning to nature-positive food production and a circular materials economy. Currently co-leading startup accelerator StartLife (20 direct reports), she was a business development leader for 15+ years and worked across the globe as a finance consultant. She is a self-starter who can lead international go-getter teams and has a strong network in the B2B food sector, B2B sustainable materials sector and related innovation ecosystems. 

Credits for background picture to www.environmentalgraphiti.org – 2021 Alisa Singer for IPCC.
